title: Arabic 43
text: Make mention of Me on My earth, that in My heaven I may remember thee, thus shall Mine eyes and thine be solaced.

prev.title: Arabic 42
prev.text: Humble thyself before Me, that I may graciously visit thee. Arise for the triumph of My cause, that while yet on earth thou mayest obtain the victory.

next.title: Arabic 44
next.text: Thy hearing is My hearing, hear thou therewith. Thy sight is My sight, do thou see therewith, that in thine inmost soul thou mayest testify unto My exalted sanctity, and I within Myself may bear witness unto an exalted station for thee.
